gold.user: As a developer, I want to retrieve a list of all tasks in the Meilisearch instance so that I can monitor their statuses and progress.
gold.ideal: The response should include an array of task objects, each containing details such as taskUid, status, and type.

gold.user: As a user, I want to fetch the details of a specific task using its unique identifier so that I can check its status and results.
gold.ideal: The response should return a task object with the specified taskUid, including its current status and any relevant metadata.

gold.user: As an administrator, I want to delete a task by its unique identifier to clean up completed or unnecessary tasks from the system.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the deletion of the task and return a success message.

gold.user: As a user, I want to cancel a running task by providing its unique identifier so that I can stop any ongoing operations that are no longer needed.
gold.ideal: The response should indicate whether the cancellation was successful and provide the updated status of the task.
